tooltip.desc: It is possible to display the automatic tooltip that effects generate without actually executing the effects.

add_base_manpower.description: Adds base manpower to the current province scope.

add_base_production.description: Adds base production to the current province scope.

add_base_tax.description: Adds base tax to the current province scope.

add_building.description:
Adds the defined building to the current province scope.
Notes: Buildings are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/buildings/*.txt.

add_building_construction.description:
Starts building construction in the current province scope.
Notes: cost and speed are a percentage of the base value, i.e. 0.5 is 50% of the base value.

add_cardinal.description: Adds a Cardinal to the current province scope, for the current owner.

add_claim.description: The defined scope gains a claim on the current province scope.

add_colonysize.description: Adds settlers to the current province scope if a colony.

add_construction_progress.description: Changes the construction progress of a great project in the current province scope.

add_core.description: The defined scope gains a core on the current province scope.

add_core_construction.description: Starts core construction in the current province scope, for the current owner.

add_culture_construction.description: Starts culture conversion in the current province scope, for the current owner.

add_devastation.description: Adds devastation to the current province scope.

add_great_project.description:
Starts construction of a great project in the current province scope.
Notes: Great projects are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/great_projects/*.txt.

add_institution_embracement.description:
Adds institution embracement progress for the defined institution in the current province scope.
Notes: The defined institution must be enabled for the owner of the province first.

add_local_autonomy.description: Adds local autonomy to the current province scope.

add_nationalism.description: Adds Nationalism to the current province scope.

add_permanent_claim.description: The defined scope gains a permanent claim on the current province scope.

add_permanent_province_modifier.description:
Adds an event modifier to the current province scope as a province modifier.
Notes: Modifiers added with this effect persist through ownership changes.

add_prosperity.description: Adds prosperity to the current province scope.

add_province_modifier.description:
Adds an event modifier to the current province scope as a province modifier.
Notes: Modifiers added with this effect are cleared automatically when the province changes ownership.

add_province_triggered_modifier.description: Adds a province triggered modifier to the current province scope.

add_reform_center.description: Adds a Center of Reformation for the defined religion in the current province scope.

add_scaled_local_adm_power.description:
Adds Administrative power to the owner of the current province scope, scaling with the base tax.
Notes: 1 power per point of yearly base tax.

add_scaled_local_dip_power.description:
Adds Diplomatic power to the owner of the current province scope, scaling with the base production.
Notes: 1 power per point of yearly base production.

add_scaled_local_mil_power.description:
Adds Military power to the owner of the current province scope, scaling with the base manpower.
Notes: 1 power per point of yearly base manpower.

add_siberian_construction.description:
Starts a siberian colony in the current province scope.
Notes: Only works if the ROOT scope is a country that can use Siberian Frontiers.

add_territorial_core.description: The defined scope gains a territorial core on the current province scope.

add_trade_modifier.description:
Adds a trade modifier for the defined country scope in the current tradenode province scope.
Notes: Can be added to any province within a tradenode.

add_trade_node_income.description:
Adds income to the current tradenode province scope.
Notes: Only works when the current province scope is the location of a tradenode center.

add_unit_construction.description:
Constructs the defined units in the current province scope.
Notes: Possible types:infantry cavalry artillery heavy_ship light_ship galley transport <unit_name>

add_unrest.description:
Adds Local Unrest to the current province scope.
Notes: Appears under Base Unrest.

artillery.description:
Spawns an artillery unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected artillery unit.

back_current_issue.description:
Backs or blocks the current issue in Parliament, if the current province scope has a seat.
Notes: No effect if the owner of the province does not have a government using has_parliament.

build_to_forcelimit.description:
Builds the defined units as a percentage of the owner's forcelimit in the current province scope.
Notes: 1 is equal to 100% of the owner's forcelimit.
Possible types:
infantry cavalry artillery heavy_ship light_ship galley transport <unit_name>

cancel_construction.description:
Cancels any construction ongoing in the current province scope.
Notes: Constructions are coring, religious conversion, cultural conversion, buildings and great projects.

cavalry.description:
Spawns an cavalry unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected cavalry unit.

cede_province.description:
The defined scope gains ownership of the current province scope.
Notes: previous_owner can be used to cede ownership to the last previous owner of a province.

change_controller.description:
The defined scope gains control over the current province scope.
Notes: Control here means occupation, not ownership.

change_culture.description:
Changes the culture of the current province scope.
Notes: Cultures are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/cultures/*.txt.
Can utilise Event Scope Values.

change_native_ferocity.description: Adds to the Native Ferocity within an uncolonized province.

change_native_hostileness.description: Adds to the Native Hostileness within an uncolonized province.

change_native_size.description: Adds to the amount of natives within an uncolonized province.

change_province_name.description: Changes the province name of the current province scope to the defined name.

change_religion.description:
Changes the religion of the current province scope.
Notes: Religions are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/religions/*.txt
Can utilise Event Scope Values.

change_siege.description: Changes the siege progress in the current province scope.

change_to_secondary_religion.description: Changes the religion in the current province scope to the syncretic religion of its owner.

change_trade_goods.description:
Sets the trade good for the current province scope.
Notes: Trade Goods are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/tradegoods/*.txt.

clr_province_flag.description: Clears a defined province flag for the current province scope.

cossack_cavalry.description:
Spawns an cossack cavalry unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected cavalry unit.

create_advisor.description:
Adds the defined advisor for the owner of the current province scope.
Notes: Advisors are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/advisors/*.txt.

create_colony.description: Starts a colony belonging to the owner of the ROOT province scope.

create_native.description:
Spawns natives in the current province scope.
Notes: Only spawnable in uncolonized provinces.

create_pirate.description:
Spawns pirates in the current province scope.
Notes: Only spawnable in sea zones and land provinces with ports.

create_revolt.description: Spawns the most likely rebel type in the current province scope.

discover_country.description:
The defined scope gains vision over the current province scope.
Notes: Best used within areas, regions, etc to add vision.

extend_province_modifier.description:
Extends the duration of an existing province modifier held by the current province scope.
Notes: Modifiers added with this effect persist through ownership changes.

galley.description:
Spawns an galley ship unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the defined scope's current galley ship unit.
Requires the current province scope to have a port.

heavy_ship.description:
Spawns an heavy ship unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the defined scope's current heavy ship unit.
Requires the current province scope to have a port.

infantry.description:
Spawns an infantry unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected infantry unit.

kill_leader.description:
Kills a leader in the current province scope if they match the type used.
Notes: Only works if the leader is assigned to a unit that is stationed in the current province.
Possible types:
general admiral conquistador explorer random <leader name>

kill_units.description:
Kills units following the defined parameters in the current province scope.
Notes: In the who parameter, you can use enemy, owner and controller.
When used with no parameters, will kill all units within the current province scope.
Possible types:
infantry cavalry artillery heavy_ship light_ship galley transport <unit_name>

light_ship.description:
Spawns an light ship unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the defined scope's current light ship unit.
Requires the current province scope to have a port.

mercenary_cavalry.description:
Spawns an mercenary cavalry unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected cavalry unit.

mercenary_infantry.description:
Spawns an mercenary infantry unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected infantry unit.

multiply_colonysize.description: Multiplies the settler count in the current province scope if a colony.

province_event.description:
Fire a province event for the current province scope. Appears for the owner of the province scope.
Notes: You cannot fire the same event within itself.

recall_merchant.description:
Recalls a placed merchant in the current tradenode province scope.
Notes: Only works when the current province scope is the location of a tradenode center.

remove_building.description:
Removes the defined building to the current province scope.
Notes: Buildings are found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/buildings/*.txt.

remove_cardinal.description: Removes a Cardinal in the current province scope.

remove_claim.description:
The defined scope loses their claim on the current province scope.
Notes: Works for both types of claims.

remove_core.description: The defined scope loses their core on the current province scope.

remove_estate.description:
Removes an estate in the current province scope.
Notes: Does not produce a tooltip.

remove_loot.description:
Removes loot from the current province scope and grants it to the defined country scope.
Notes: The who parameter accepts enemy, which distributes the loot to all current enemies of the province owner.

remove_province_modifier.description: Removes an already assigned province modifier from the current province scope.

remove_reform_center.description: Removes the Center of Reformation for the defined religion in the current province scope.

remove_territorial_core.description: The defined scope loses their territorial core on the current province scope.

remove_trade_modifier.description: Removes a trade modifier for the defined country scope in the current tradenode province scope.

rename_capital.description:
Changes the capital name of the current province scope to the defined name.
Notes: The capital name is the second name that appears under the province name within the province window.

send_missionary.description: Starts religious conversion in the current province scope, for the current owner.

set_estate.description:
Adds an estate to the current province scope.
Notes: Will override a previous estate.

set_in_empire.description: Places the current province scope in the Holy Roman Empire.

set_local_autonomy.description: Sets local autonomy for the current province scope.

set_province_flag.description:
Defines a province flag for the current province scope.
Notes: Flags can be appended with scopes or event targets

set_seat_in_parliament.description:
Adds the current province scope to Parliament.
Notes: No effect if the owner of the province does not have a government using has_parliament.

spawn_rebels.description:
Spawns the defined rebels in the current province scope.
Notes: Rebel types found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/rebel_types/*.txt.

streltsy_infantry.description:
Spawns an streltsy infantry unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the currently selected infantry unit.

transport.description:
Spawns an transport ship unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Uses the defined scope's current transport ship unit.
Requires the current province scope to have a port.

undiscover_country.description:
The defined scope loses vision over the current province scope.
Notes: Best used within areas, regions, etc to remove vision.

rebel_types.description:
Spawns the defined rebel type in the current province scope.
Notes: Rebel types found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/rebel_types/*.txt.

units.description:
Spawns a specific unit in the current province scope for the defined country scope.
Notes: Units can be found in /Europa Universalis IV/common/units/*.txt.
